Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

package com.example.syntaxeventlottery
  • Class
    Description
    AdminActivity
    The AdminActivity class provides the main interface for administrators, allowing them to browse events and users within the application.
    AdminEventAdapter
    The AdminEventAdapter class extends ArrayAdapter to provide a custom adapter for displaying event items in a list view for administrators.
    AdminEventDetailActivity
    The AdminEventDetailActivity class displays detailed information about an event to administrators, including event name, description, facility, capacity, start date, end date, and poster image.
    AdminEventsActivity
    The AdminEventsActivity class displays a list of events to the administrator.
    AdminUserAdapter
    The AdminUserAdapter class extends ArrayAdapter to provide a custom adapter for displaying user profiles in a list view for administrators.
    AdminUserDetailActivity
    The AdminUserDetailActivity class displays detailed information about a user to administrators, including username, user ID, email, phone number, and profile image.
    AdminUsersActivity
    The AdminUsersActivity class displays a list of users to the administrator.
    CreateUserProfileActivity
    Handles the creation and updating of an Entrant's profile.
    EditEventActivity
    The EditEventActivity class allows users to edit existing events.
    EditUserProfileActivity
    The EditUserProfileActivity class allows users to edit their profile information, including name, email, phone number, facility, and profile photo.
    Entrant
    Represents an Entrant in the Event Lottery System.
    Event
    Represents an event in the Event Lottery System.
    EventAdapter
    The EventAdapter class extends RecyclerView.Adapter to provide a custom adapter for displaying event items in a RecyclerView.
    EventDetailActivity
    Activity to display event details and manage event actions.
    EventRepository
    The EventRepository class provides methods to interact with Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage for event-related operations.
    EventTest
     
    EventWaitingListActivity
    The EventWaitingListActivity class displays the waiting list of participants for a specific event.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Facility
     
    FacilityProfileActivity
    The FacilityProfileActivity class allows users to enter and save facility details.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class serves as the entry point of the application.
    Notification
    Model class for a notification.
    NotificationAdapter
    Adapter for displaying notifications in a RecyclerView.
    NotificationCenterActivity
    Activity to display the Notification Center with all unread notifications.
    OrganizerActivity
    OrganizerActivity allows the event organizer to view and manage their created events.
    OrganizerCreateEvent
    The OrganizerCreateEvent class allows event organizers to create new events.
    User
    Represents a general user within the Event Lottery System.
    UserHomeActivity
    The UserHomeActivity class represents the main screen for users after logging in.
    UserProfileActivity
    The UserProfileActivity class displays the user's profile information, including name, email, phone number, facility, and profile picture.
    UserRepository
    Manages data operations related to users, including Entrants.
    UserRepository.OnCheckEntrantExistsListener
    Listener for checking if an Entrant exists.
    UserRepository.OnDeleteCompleteListener
    Listener for delete operations.
    UserRepository.OnEntrantDataFetchListener
    Listener for fetching Entrant data.
    UserRepository.OnEntrantUpdateListener
    Listener for updating Entrant data.
    UserRepository.OnUploadCompleteListener
    Listener for upload operations.
    UserTest
    Tests for the User class.
    WaitingListAdapter
    The WaitingListAdapter class extends RecyclerView.Adapter to display a list of users in a RecyclerView.
    WaitingListAdapter.ViewHolder
    The ViewHolder class holds references to the views for each item in the RecyclerView.
